summary:
Brussels: ☁️ Avg 30.1°C (1°C range), 12% rain (16% range)
High 36°C / Low 24°C
gpt_comment: Brussels is set for a warm day with an average temperature of 30.1°C, reaching up to 36°C, and a low chance of rain at 12%. Meteoblue aligns with this, predicting a high of 92°F (about 33°C) and minimal rainfall. Perfect weather to enjoy a cold drink on a terrace and maybe spot a monkey at the local zoo!
